sentence.Network_en: They planned to have the gilts farrow down about the end of this month.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们计划让母猪约在本月底下仔.

sentence.Network_en: Our sow had 15 at one farrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的母猪一胎下了15个小猪.

sentence.Network_en: Ireland is the old sow that eats her farrow.
sentence.Network_cn: 爱尔兰就像是吞食自己小猪的母猪.
